name: Scattered Jack
description:
My sumission for the 2020 Narrascope game jam. To match the theme of "Growth," I adapted an old story of mine (based on a MUCH older myth) and added some mildly interactive elements.

Clicking the "fullscreen" button is highly recommended as some of the text will otherwise be rather small.

CONTENT WARNING: There are no explicit scenes but the story does deal with themes of mental health and suicide which some readers might find uncomfortable.
